attributes.action: scrap plans for an additional horse tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are plans being made to add a £10.00 annual "tax" per horse for all uk owners.  This tax is apparently for measures to be taken in case of an outbreak of a contagious disease.  I personally think we pay enough with  our insurances for issues like this and it seems yet again a group of people are being singled out to make money.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to scrap plans for an additional horse tax.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=ntht09


Her Majesty's Government
